mapper.select: select id as id, name as name, fee as fee, voice as voice, local_voice as localVoice, long_dist_voice as longDistVoice, gprs as gprs, sms as sms, mms as mms, local_voice_price as localVoicePrice, long_dist_voice_price as longDistVoicePrice, gprs_price as gprsPrice, sms_price as smsPrice, feature as feature from bi_4g_package

select id as id, name as name, fee as fee, voice as voice, local_voice as localVoice, long_dist_voice as longDistVoice, gprs as gprs, sms as sms, mms as mms, local_voice_price as localVoicePrice, long_dist_voice_price as longDistVoicePrice, gprs_price as gprsPrice, sms_price as smsPrice, feature as feature from bi_package where id = #{id}

select id as id, name as name, fee as fee, voice as voice, local_voice as localVoice, long_dist_voice as longDistVoice, gprs as gprs, sms as sms, mms as mms, local_voice_price as localVoicePrice, long_dist_voice_price as longDistVoicePrice, gprs_price as gprsPrice, sms_price as smsPrice, feature as feature from bi_package
